product_name: Point 65 Mercury GTX Modular Kayak - Middle Section
long_description: The Point 65 Mercury GTX Modular Kayak Middle Section combines with the Mercury GTX Solo Modular Kayak Bow and Stern Sections (sold separately) to form a tandem kayak that's easy to travel with.
short_description: The Point 65 Mercury GTX Modular Kayak Middle Section combines with the Mercury GTX Solo Modular Kayak Bow and Stern Sections (sold separately) to form a tandem kayak that's easy to travel with.
